gurmukhi: pr qRIA rwcY ] Gr Gr jwcY ] jh qh folYN ] rih rih bolYN ]87]
transliteration: Par Treea Raachai|| Ghar Ghar Jaachai|| Jah Tah Dolain|| Rah(i) Rah(i) Dolain||87||
translation: Entering the houses of other, they will roam and speak here and there and will remain absorbed with others women.87.

gurmukhi: Dn nhI CorYN ] ins Gr PorYN ] gih bhu mwrIAq ] nrkh fwrIAq ]88]
transliteration: Dhan Nahi Chhodhain|| Nis Ghar Phorain|| Gadh Bahu Mdareeat|| Narkah Ddareeat||88||
translation: Covering for wealth, they will go for theft during the night; they will be destroyed collectively and will go to hell.88.

gurmukhi: As dur krmM ] Cut jg DrmM ] miq ipq BrmYN ] Dsq n Gr mYN ]89]
transliteration: As Dur Karamannd|| Chhout Jag Dharamannd|| Mat(i) Pit Bharmain|| Dhasat Na Ghar Main||89||
translation: Because of their such-like sinful acts, no dharma will be left in the world; the parents will not enter the houses being frightened.89.

gurmukhi: isK muK morYN ] BiRq niRp CorYN ] qj qRIA Brqw ] ibsro krqw ]90]
transliteration: Sikh Moukh Morain|| Bhrit Nrip Chhodhain|| Taj Treea Bhartaa|| Bisro Kartaa||90||
translation: The disciples will turn away from their Guru and the servants will leave the king; the wife, relinquishing her husband, will also forget the Lord.90.

gurmukhi: nv nv krmM ] biF gieE BrmM ] sB jg pwpI ] khUM n jwpI ]91]
transliteration: Nav Nav Karamannd|| Badh(i) Gado Bharamannd|| Sabh Jah Paapi|| Kahoon Na Jaapee||91||
translation: Because of the new types of Karmas, the illusions will increase; the whole world will become sinful and no person repeating the Name or performing austerities, will be left in the world.91.

gurmukhi: dyKIAq sB pwpI nh hir jwpI qdp mhw irs TwnYN ] Aiq ibBcwrI pr qRIA BwrI dyv ipqr nhI mwnY ]
transliteration: Dekheeat Sabh Paapi Nah Har(i) Jaapi Tadap Mahaa Ris Thaanain|| At(i) Bibhchaari Par Treea Bhaari Dev Pitar Nahi Maanai||
translation: The sinners will be seen on all sides, there will be no meditation on the Lord; even then there will be great jealousy with one another; those who go to the wives of others and commit sinful acts will have no beliefs in gods and manes;

gurmukhi: qdp mhw br khq DrmDr pwp krm AiDkwrI ] DiRg DiRg sB AwKY muK pr nhI BwKY dyh piRSt ciV gwrI ]92]
transliteration: Tadap Mahaa Bar Kahat Dharamdhar Paap Karam Adhikdaree|| Dhrig Dhrig Sabh Aakhai Moukh Par Nahibhaakhai Deh Prisht Chad(i) Gdaree||92||
translation: Even then the sinners will remain religious leader; none will talk on the face, but slander others at the back.92.

gurmukhi: dyKIAq ibn krmM qj kul DrmM qdp khwq su mwns ] Aiq riq loBM rhq su CoBM lok sgl Bl jwns ]
transliteration: Dekheeat Bin Karamannd Taj Kul Dharamannd Tadap Kahaat Su Maanas|| At(i) Rat(i) Lobhan Rahat Su Chhodhhan Lok Sagad Bhal Jaanas||
translation: Without doing good work and forsaking the traditional religion of the clan, the people even then will be called good persons; the people will consider those persons good, who will always remain anxious, coveting in their mind for the sexual enjoyment;

gurmukhi: qdp ibnw giq clq burI miq loB moh bis BwrI ] ipq mwq n mwnY kCU n jwnY lYh Grx qy gwrI ]93]
transliteration: Tadap Bina Gad(i) Chalat Boutimat(i) Lobh Bas(i) Bhaari|| Pit Maat Na Maanai Kachhodh Na Jaanai Laih Gharan Te Gadri||93||
translation: The people will follow the vicious doctrines under the impact of great greed and attachment; they will have no love for their parents and will be rebuked by their wives.93.

gurmukhi: dyvIAq jy DrmI qy Bey AkrmI qdp khwq mhw mq ] Aq bs nwrI Abgiq BwrI jwnq skl ibnw jq ]
transliteration: Deeeat Je Dharmite Bhae Akarmitadap Kahaat Mahaa Mat|| At Bas Naari Abgad(i) Bhaarijaanat Sakal Binaa Jat||
translation: The pious ones will be seen performing bad acts and even then they would like to be called good ones; all of them will be under the impact of their women and remaining without restraint, they will be in decadence;

gurmukhi: qdp n mwnq kumq pRTwnq mq Aru gq ky kwcy ] ijh iqh Gr folq Bly n bolq log lwj qj nwcy ]94]
transliteration: Tadap Na Maanat Koumat Prathaanat Mat Ar(u) Gad Ke Kaadhe|| Jih Tih Ghar Dolat Bhale Na Dolat Log Laaj Taj Naache||94||
translation: Even then, the people without intellect, will not shirk from the performance of bad karmas; they will roam here and there uttering uncivilized words and will also dance unashamedly.94.

gurmukhi: pwp krY inq pRwq Gny ] jn doKn ky qr su`D bny ] jg Cor Bjw gq Drmn kI ] su jhwN qhwN pwp kiRAw pRcurI ]95]
transliteration: Paap Darai Nit Praat Ghane|| Jan Dokhan Ke Tar Suddh Bane|| Jag Chhodh Bhajaa Gad Dharman Kee|| Su Jahaan Paap Kriaa Prachuree||95||
translation: They will commit new sins and talking about the blemishes of others, they themselves will remain pure; the followers of the religions, will forsake the world and run away and there will be the propagation of the sinful activities here and there.95.
